Replace.Text: [COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MODIFIER_BULL_MOOSE_NEGATIVE_APPEAL]They are disappointed that your empire lacks appealing areas
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MODIFIER_BULL_MOOSE_POSITIVE_APPEAL]They admire the many appealing areas within your empire

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_ANTIQUES_AND_PARKS_DESCRIPTION]Breathtaking tiles adjacent to either a Natural Wonder or a Mountain receive +2 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science. Breathtaking tiles adjacent to either a Wonder or Woods receive +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. All tiles in a city with a National Park are +1 Appeal.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_ROOSEVELT_COROLLARY_ROUGH_RIDER_DESCRIPTION]Units receive +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength on their home continent. Envoys sent to City-States you have a [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route to count as two [ICON_Envoy] Envoys. Gain the Rough Rider unique unit with Rifling.
